attributes.action: Stop the clocks going back in the Autumn to give us all an extra hour of daylight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The end of BST always signals a change in mood for most people, the start of leaving work in the dark, restrictions on the amount of outdoor leisure activities we can undertake and  a rise in fuel bills.  Please sign this petition to get this outdated practice consigned to history once and for all!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
